https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sLiscgA9fcukGfIUvA9Oq8OxeON.jpg A recently-deposed "Estrovian" monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity. Later, he's wrongly accused of being a Communist and gets caught up in subsequent HUAC hearings. A King in New York
